doc:
John Abbott (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Abbott_(actor) 0 John Albert Chamberlain Kefford (5 June 1905 – 24 May 1996) was an English character actor professionally known as John Abbott. His memorable roles include the invalid Frederick Fairlie in the 1948 film The Woman in White and the pacifist Ayelborne in the Star Trek episode "Errand of Mercy". He also played Sesmar on an episode of Lost in Space, "The Dream Monster", in 1966. Abbott was known as a Shakespearean actor. John_Albert_Chamberlain_Kefford ( 5_June_1905 – 24_May_1996 ) was an_English_character_actor professionally_known as John_Abbott . His_memorable_roles include the_invalid_Frederick_Fairlie in the_1948_film The_Woman in White and the_pacifist_Ayelborne in the_Star_Trek_episode_"_Errand of Mercy " . He also played Sesmar on an_episode of Lost in Space , " The_Dream_Monster_" , in 1966 . Abbott was_known as a_Shakespearean_actor .
